1.content:
Meredith Grey just finished her medical exam in Boston and moved to Seattle to get her first job assignment as assistance doctor in Seattle Grace Hospital. Also she grown up in Seattle and so can return to her hometown and also take care of her mother, who is suffering from Alzheimer.
Her mother was a well known and very respected surgeon.
Our fanfiction as well as the real TV show starts on the morning, where she has her first day at the new job. She had a one night stand with a handsome guy. She only knew his name, Derek, but what more you need to know from a one night stand. They met in a bar the night before and had some drinks together and so one thing was leading to another.
But now she has to get rid of him and rush to the hospital to not be late for on her first day.
1.title: start

info.brief_description: since nothing for this seems to be here
info.description: I don't own any rights on this one, but it want to try an interactive here
